catList: Data Mining and Forecasting: During the last few years, our ability to process data as well as 'information glut' has increased exponentially. Data mining (also known as knowledge discovery) is the process of analyzing data to identify not-so-obvious patterns and/or relationships by automatically searching large stores of data. The purpose of this course is to introduce the student to various data mining concepts, algorithms, and their applications to real-world business problems.
